sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnproxyloginfo ( proxy_id , clnt_ip , clnt_port , conect_time , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #proxyId# , #clntIp# , #clntPort# , #conectTime# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnproxyloginfo SET proxy_id = #proxyId# , clnt_ip = #clntIp# , clnt_port = #clntPort# , conect_time = #conectTime# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , log_id = #logId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND proxy_id = #proxyId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnproxyloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND proxy_id = #proxyId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT proxy_id , clnt_ip , clnt_port , conect_time , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM COMTNPROXYLOGINFO WHERE proxy_id = #proxyId# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.PROXY_ID , A.CLNT_IP , A.CLNT_PORT , A.CONECT_TIME , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LOG_ID FROM ( SELECT PROXY_ID , CLNT_IP , CLNT_PORT , CONECT_TIME , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LOG_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNPROXYLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
PROXY_ID = #searchKeyword#
CLNT_IP LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY PROXY_ID DESC , LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNPROXYLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
PROXY_ID = #searchKeyword#
CLNT_IP LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
